definition: to sell as agent/to sell on commission (e.g. insurance policies)/proxy sale (of stocks)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: We acquaint you that we have established ourselves as general agents under the title of Chambers Co.
sentences.chinese: 我們將以錢伯斯公司爲名，開設總代銷店，特此奉告。

sentences.english: Where a business entity consigns goods to others for sale.
sentences.chinese: 四營業人委託他人代銷貨物者。

sentences.english: Affiliates have a number of options for promoting your product.
sentences.chinese: 代銷商有許多產品推廣方面的選擇。

sentences.english: Do you still have a Canadian outlet?
sentences.chinese: 你現在在加拿大還有代銷店嗎？

sentences.english: Both of these ways would be an affiliate order, but list you as the referrer.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種方法都是代銷商訂單，但您會被列爲推薦者。

sentences.english: Now we wish to ask your company to sell these marten overcoats on consignment.
sentences.chinese: 這次，我想請貴公司幫助我們代銷這批貂皮大衣。

sentences.english: He establish himself as a general agent.
You can get Affiliate Certification at both the website and product level.
sentences.chinese: 您可以獲得網站層級和產品層級的代銷商認證。

sentences.english: Commodities can be sold by the commercial departments on a commission basis.
Based on research of existing affiliate programs, this seemed like good place to start.
sentences.chinese: 根據現有代銷商方案的調查，這似乎最好的起始佣金。

sentences.english: Now we would like to ask your company to sell these marten overcoats on consignment.
sentences.chinese: 這次，我想請貴公司幫助我們代銷這批貂皮大衣。

sentences.english: We acquaint you that we have established ourselves as general agent under the title of Chamber & Co.
sentences.chinese: 我們將以錢伯斯公司爲名，開設總代銷店，特此奉告。

sentences.english: Improving deputed brokers' Co. management abilities. 6th.
sentences.chinese: 提升代銷公司管理能力。

sentences.english: The shoe manufacturer had several outlets.
sentences.chinese: 那家制鞋廠商有幾家代銷店。
